data: Upon the fourth day after the reception of her Paris letter, my Lady had to leave Mirk for town on business connected with Walter’s affairs—for, after all, she cannot permit his elder brother to bear the whole brunt of these unexpected expenses.

Upon the fourth day after the reception of her Paris letter, my Lady had to leave Mirk for town on business connected with Walter's affairs--for, after all, she cannot permit his elder brother to bear the whole brunt of these unexpected expenses.
